name: Worthy
overview: Hot on the heels of AlarCity, PixelGlass brings you this high-quality Amiga action puzzle game ' Worthy '. Worthy is an Amiga game for all 1MB, PAL Amiga machines (including A500, A600, A1200, CD32 e.t.c.) running at 50hz even on Amiga 500! But that's not all, as the game itself is rather massive for an action puzzler, as it also features 40 stunning action-packed levels, mind-bending puzzles, superb 32 colour pixel art, catchy tunes, arcade-style presentation, and multiple endings. Assume the role of a fearless boy and collect the required number of diamonds in each stage in order to win the girl's heart! Travel from maze to maze, kill the baddies, avoid the traps, collect beers (your necessary "fuel" to keep you going), find the diamonds, prove to her you're WORTHY!! Graphics and sound effects by John Tsakiris, coded by Alex Brown (creator of Blocky Skies), and music by Simone BernaccHia.
